ui-predicate

Namespaces

  • vue
    • UIPredicateCoreVue

UIPredicateCoreVue.js

  1. /* eslint no-unused-vars: "off"*/
  3. /**
  4.  * VueJS adapter for ui-predicate-core
  5.  * @namespace vue
  6.  * @since 1.0.0
  7.  */
  9. import Vue from 'vue';
  10. import assign from 'lodash/assign';
  11. import { PredicateCore, UITypes } from 'ui-predicate-core';
  12. import DEFAULT_COMPONENTS from './default-components';
  14. const defaults = {
  15.   options: {
  16.     /**
  17.      * UIPredicate Vue Adapter own default argument component
  18.      * @return {Vue.component} the default Vue Component to use as argument specifier
  19.      * @see core.defaults.getDefaultArgumentComponent
  20.      * @memberof vue.defaults
  21.      */
  22.     getDefaultArgumentComponent() {
  23.       return DEFAULT_COMPONENTS[UITypes.ARGUMENT_DEFAULT];
  24.     },
  25.   },
  26. };
  28. /**
  29.  * UIPredicateCore adapter for VueJS
  30.  * @param       {?dataclasses.CompoundPredicate} [data=PredicateCore.defaults.options.getDefaultData] data
  31.  * @param       {Object} [columns=PredicateCore.defaults.columns] columns
  32.  * @param       {Object} [options=PredicateCore.defaults.options] options
  33.  * @return {Promise<core.PredicateCoreAPI>} resolved promise yield a PredicateCoreAPI
  34.  * @memberof vue
  35.  */
  36. function UIPredicateCoreVue({ data, columns, ui, options } = {}) {
  37.   return PredicateCore({
  38.     data,
  39.     columns,
  40.     ui: assign({}, DEFAULT_COMPONENTS, ui),
  41.     options: assign({}, defaults.options, options),
  42.   });
  43. }
  45. UIPredicateCoreVue.defaults = defaults;
  47. export { UIPredicateCoreVue };
